name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

description: A mysterious island in the Grand Line where the Straw Hat Pirates land after defeating Foxy. The island features dense jungle terrain with unusual bicycle tracks running through it. This island becomes the site of the crew's fateful encounter with Admiral Aokiji.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Land on Island
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates disembark on Long Ring Long Land and set up a barbecue on the beach.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Straw Hats will encounter Admiral Aokiji.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Bicycle Tracks
keyEvents.description: The crew ventures into the jungle and discovers mysterious bicycle tracks.
keyEvents.significance: Foreshadows Aokiji's presence on the island.

keyEvents.title: Aokiji Found in Jungle Clearing
keyEvents.description: Following the bicycle tracks, the Straw Hats find Aokiji sleeping behind a rock in a jungle clearing.
keyEvents.significance: The site of one of the most important encounters in the pre-Water 7 storyline.

name.japanese: ロングリングロングランドのジャングル
name.romanized: Rongu Ringu Rongu Rando no Janguru

description: A dense jungle area on Long Ring Long Land featuring mysterious bicycle tracks. The Straw Hats venture here to search for medicinal herbs, which leads to their encounter with Aokiji sleeping in a clearing.

keyEvents.title: Bicycle Tracks Discovery
keyEvents.description: The crew finds unusual bicycle tracks running through the jungle path.

keyEvents.title: Aokiji's First Appearance
keyEvents.description: Chopper discovers Aokiji sleeping behind a rock disguised as a mushroom.
keyEvents.significance: The exact location where Admiral Aokiji is first encountered.

name.japanese: セクシーフォクシー号

description: The main pirate ship of the Foxy Pirates, commanded by Captain Foxy. In this episode, it serves as the battleground for the final confrontation between the Straw Hats and Foxy Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Trapped
keyEvents.description: Foxy traps the Straw Hats in a pit on the Sexy Foxy's deck using his Noro Noro Beam.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the final battle of the Foxy's Return arc.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Thunderstorm Tempo
keyEvents.description: Nami debuts her Thunderstorm Tempo technique on the ship.
keyEvents.significance: Location where Nami reveals her new combat ability.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Defeats Foxy
keyEvents.description: The final battle between Luffy and Foxy concludes on the ship's deck.
keyEvents.significance: The site where the Foxy's Return arc concludes.
